text: Leeroy Mavunga (born 6 December 1998) is a Zimbabwean footballer who plays as a midfielder for Yadah Stars F.C. and the Zimbabwe national football team. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Zimbabwe's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
